  return(result)
  
}

Q2.2.2 Birds Function
```{r}
bird_checker <- function(x){
  birds <- c("duck","goose","pigeon")
  if(x %in% birds){
    return("bird")
  }else {
    return("not bird")
  }
}

```

Q2.2.2 Birds Function -testing

```{r}
bird_checker(5)
```
